subtitle: Enhance the GIF recorder by adding new formats for recording your model. Replace the built-in GIF format with a higher quality one.
description:
This plugin extends the built-in GIF recorder with a number of new formats to record your model with.

The new formats can be found inside the GIF recorder. You can find the Record Gif... button under the View menu.

Formats

  • GIF
    • Record animated GIFs in higher quality than the built-in GIF format
  • MP4 Video
    • Record an MP4 video
  • MKV Video
    • Record an MKV video
  • MOV Video
    • Record an MOV video
  • WebM Video
    • Record a WebM video
  • Animated WebP
    • Record an animated WebP image
  • Spritesheet
    • Record to a vertically stacked spritesheet texture
